thread.section_title: ezStorage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ezStorage | ezstorage.com
thread.title: Tammy

author: Tammy
title: Tammy
text: I would not recommend EZ Storage to anybody that I know. You did not honor the one dollar for your first month because I had to upgrade to a larger unit. I went in on a Friday to secure everything for the following day move in and because of that, and needing to upgrade to a larger unit. It did not only cost me the difference between the two units, but I also lost the one dollar for the month which meant that my move into EZ storage ended up costing me almost $200 of unexpected money. Highly dissatisfied. We pull out as quickly as possible.
